item.title: Org-Mode in Spacemacs
item.description: My second ever (and apparently most popular) video was about how to use Org-Mode in Spacemacs. There’s many really good tutorials for Org-Mode but none really focus on Spacemacs specifically. I cover: Basic markup syntax Various shortcuts Task tracking, agenda Various shortcuts Check it out ðŸ˜„
